snippet: America hasn’t done nearly enough to aid Syria’s rebels. With just a few key arms shipments, we could ensure the downfall of one of our chief adversaries.
abstract: Op-Ed article by investment firm founder Bartle B Bull asserts that America has not done enough to aid Syria's rebels; maintains that sending them just a few key arms shipments could ensure the downfall of Pres Bashar al-Assad's government.
lead_paragraph: America hasn’t done nearly enough to aid Syria’s rebels. With just a few key arms shipments, we could ensure the downfall of one of our chief adversaries.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
